article_title: Outsider Ben Carson Rises in 2016 GOP Field
article_text:
DES MOINES, Iowa—Ben Carson, the retired neurosurgeon who has become a sensation in conservative circles, has a campaign-in-waiting with paid staff in two states. A Draft Carson movement claims chairmen in all 99 Iowa counties. Pollsters regularly find Mr. Carson landing toward the top of the early surveys of the GOP presidential field.

Every presidential election draws candidates from outside the world of politics who hope voters...

twitter.description: Ben Carson, the retired neurosurgeon who has become a sensation in conservative circles, is bringing a strong organization to his quest for the 2016 Republican presidential nomination.
twitter.creator: @reidepstein
